result.eng: They made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
result.ga: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach di

result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad tairiscint dom nárḃ ḟéidir liom eiteaċ diThey made me an offer I couldn't refuse.

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
